query: SELECT column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = 'users';
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2RUrRz5SLeyapWk.2338944f899a --database 3Dxxg2wmCU5MZJouft3HN4 --execute SELECT column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = 'users';

id	int

email	varchar
